H0.text: In which athletics event has the Fosbury Flop been much adopted since 1968 . Long Jump

H1.text: In which athletics event has the Fosbury Flop been much adopted since 1968 . Pole Vault

H2.text: In which athletics event has the Fosbury Flop been much adopted since 1968 . Triple Jump

H3.text: In which athletics event has the Fosbury Flop been much adopted since 1968 . Highjump

A4.text: The Fosbury Flop is considered the most efficient way for competitors to propel themselves over the bar.

A5.text: Since Fosbury used his new style, called the Fosbury flop, to win the gold medal of the 1968 Mexico Olympics.
